description: An operations event class is a representation of groupings of operations event definitions
title: Operations event class
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The nested operations event class(s) makes up part of this operations event class as the whole
This operations event class(s) include properties of the operations event class
The operations event class property(s) of this operations event class
The operations event class record specification(s) related to this operations event class

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information and description about the operations event class

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: Defines constraints on the inclusion of the respective operations event class in a hierarchy
extension.comment: Defined value are - sealed: no entry can use this entry as its parent; - (No entry): no entry allows any entry to represent this entry as its parent /ancestor. NOTE 1 Extension can contain a set of entries of other operations event classes who represent this entry in their parent
